structure.name: Component

method.name: i_cal_component_new
method.comment: Creates a new #ICalComponent with specific type.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_from_string
method.comment: Creates a new #ICalComponent based on a string.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_x
method.comment: Creates a new #ICalComponent based on name of x property.

returns.comment: true if yes, false if not.

method.name: i_cal_component_isa_component

returns.comment: true if yes, false if not.

method.comment: Checks whether the native part of #ICalComponent is icalcomponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_take_property
method.comment: Adds the @property into the @component and unrefs the @property.

method.name: i_cal_component_remove_property
method.comment: Removes #ICalProperty from #ICalComponent. Caution: The compare is based on address. So you must use the original #ICalProperty as the target.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_parent
method.comment: Gets the parent component of the property. Use with caution. When icalproperty is deallocated, it won't deallocate its parent. However the #ICalComponent object created using this method will be deallocated (if no reference in other places). So You need to make sure there is another reference except the one in #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_set_parent
method.comment: Sets the parent #ICalComponent of the specified #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_datetime_with_component

returns.comment: Get a DATE or DATE-TIME property as an #ICalTime.

method.comment: If the property is a DATE-TIME with a TZID parameter and a corresponding VTIMEZONE is present in the component, the returned component will already be in the correct timezone; otherwise the caller is responsible for converting it. * * The @comp can be NULL, in which case the parent of the @prop is used to find the corresponding time zone.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_first_property
method.comment: Gets the first #ICalProperty with specific kind in #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_next_property
method.comment: Gets the next #ICalProperty with specific kind in #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_inner

returns.comment: The first VEVENT, VTODO or VJOURNAL sub-component.

method.comment: Returns the first VEVENT, VTODO or VJOURNAL sub-component of cop, or comp if it is one of those types.

method.name: i_cal_component_add_component
method.comment: Adds a #ICalComponent into another #ICalComponent as a child component.

method.name: i_cal_component_take_component
method.comment: Adds the @child into the @parent as a child component and unrefs the @child.

method.name: i_cal_component_count_components

returns.comment: The count of child #ICalComponent in the parent one.

method.comment: Counts the child #ICalComponent with the target kind in the parent one.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_parent
method.comment: Gets the parent component of the @component.

method.name: i_cal_component_merge_component

parameter.name: comp_to_merge
parameter.comment: A #ICalComponent. After merged it will not exist any more.

method.comment: Takes 2 VCALENDAR components and merges the second one into the first, resolving any problems with conflicting TZIDs. comp_to_merge will no longer exist after calling this function.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_first_component
method.comment: Gets the first #ICalComponent with specific kind in #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_next_component
method.comment: Gets the next #ICalComponent with specific kind in #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_begin_component
method.comment: Gets the #ICalCompIter pointing to the first child #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_end_component
method.comment: Gets the #ICalCompIter pointing to the end child #ICalComponent.

returns.comment: true if a valid iterator; false otherwise.

method.name: i_cal_comp_iter_next
i_cal_comp_iter_prior
i_cal_comp_iter_deref
i_cal_component_begin_property
method.comment: Gets the #ICalPropIter pointing to the first property of type @kind in #ICalComponent.

returns.comment: true if a valid iterator; false otherwise.

method.name: i_cal_prop_iter_next
i_cal_prop_iter_deref
i_cal_component_count_errors
method.comment: Counts the number of errors in #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_convert_errors
method.comment: Converts some X-LIC-ERROR properties into RETURN-STATUS properties.

returns.comment: true if @kind id a #ICalComponent but not the I_CAL_NO_COMPONENT, false if not.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_first_real_component

returns.comment: A reference to the first VEVENT, VTODO or VJOURNAL

method.comment: For VCOMPONENT: Returns a reference to the first VEVENT, VTODO or VJOURNAL.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_span
method.comment: For VEVENT, VTODO, VJOURNAL and VTIMEZONE: reports the start and end times of an event in UTC.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_status
method.comment: Returns the property status of the #ICalComponent. ICAL_STATUS_NONE is returned if a problem parsing the component was detected.

method.name: i_cal_component_foreach_tzid

parameter.name: user_data
parameter.comment: The user data for callback function

method.comment: Applies the same manipulation on every tzid in #ICalComponent.

method.name: i_cal_component_foreach_recurrence

parameter.name: callback
parameter.comment: Function called for each timespan within the range

parameter.name: user_data
parameter.comment: The user data for callback function

method.comment: Cycles through all recurrences of an event. This function will call the specified callback function for once for the base value of DTSTART, and foreach recurring date/time value. It will filter out events that are specified as an EXDATE or an EXRULE.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_timezone
method.comment: Returns the icaltimezone in the component corresponding to the TZID, or NULL if it can't be found.

method.name: i_cal_property_recurrence_is_excluded

parameter.name: dtstart
parameter.comment: The base dtstart value for this component

returns.comment: true if yes, false if not.

method.comment: Decides if this recurrence is acceptable. This function decides if a specific recurrence value is excluded by EXRULE or EXDATE properties.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vcalendar
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vcalendar.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vevent
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vevent.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vtodo
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vtodo.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vjournal
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vjournal.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_valarm
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be valarm.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vfreebusy
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vfreebusy.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vtimezone
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vtimezone.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_xstandard
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be xstandard.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_xdaylight
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be xdaylight.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vagenda
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vagenda.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vquery
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vquery.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vavailability
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vavailability.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_xavailable
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be xavailable.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vpoll
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vpoll.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_vvoter
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be vvoter.

method.name: i_cal_component_new_xvote
method.comment: Creates a #ICalComponent with the type to be xvote.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_component_name
method.comment: Returns the name of the @component as string.

method.name: i_cal_component_get_x_name

returns.comment: X (custom) name of the @component, or %NULL, when it's not a X component

method.comment: Returns the X (custom) name of the @component as string, or %NULL.

method.name: i_cal_component_set_x_name
method.comment: Sets an X (custom) name of the @component.

method.name: i_cal_component_normalize
method.comment: Normalizes (reorders and sorts the properties) the @component.

method.name: i_cal_component_remove_property_by_kind
method.comment: Removes all properties of that kind in the #ICalComponent.
